column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I made sure I had my ticket in advance and checked to make sure my flight was not canceled .
#id=2
#text=I had pre-packed what I needed and doubled checked the list to make sure that all my items were approved .
#id=3
#text=Then , I arrived at the airport about one and a half hours early .
#id=4
#text=I made sure to go through security first , since there were long lines for that .
#id=5
#text=I had to take off my shoes and put my bags through an x-ray .
#id=6
#text=After I was done , I put my luggage in the correct area so it could be loaded on the plane .
#id=7
#text=I waited until my plane was ready to board and showed the flight attendant my boarding pass .
#id=8
#text=I stayed quietly on the plane and made sure I was in my assigned seat .
#id=9
#text=It can be crowded and boring , so I read my book on the flight .
#text=I made sure to listen to the flight attendants when they had an announcement to make .
